body.name: EIUE Bed Pillows for Sleeping 2 Pack Queen Size，Super Soft Down Alternative Microfiber Filled Pillows,20 x 30 Inches,White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 27 mins
features: Breathable Material: EIUE bed pillow for sleeping goes with a breathable cotton cover and breathable down alternative microfiber, which is friendly to skin and ensures you a comfortable night's sleep.

Balanced Comfort: The filling of the pillow consists of 50% Hollow Fiber and 50% Gel fiber, which provides a great balance of supple softness and plump firmness. The bed pillow is supportive enough and excellent for a back, side or stomach sleeper.

Perfect Size: The dimension of the Queen Pillow is 20 x 30inches(48cm x 74cm)(approx). 1kg(2.2lb) down alternative microfiber filling with breathable cover. Our 2 pack pillows come vacuum-sealed for shipping, once opened it will start to fluff up. Please leave 24 hours for the pillow to get to full thickness before using it.

Careful Maintenance: These bed pillows are machine washable with tumble dry low, and will always feel and look like new! All product materials are carefully selected, strictly inspected and well constructed to make the pillows durable to daily usage.
What You Get: 2 pack of Hotel Collection Bed Pillows and we offer one year guarantee to protect your pillows against manufacturer defects. Contact us if you meet any quality issues.
body.description: 2PACK Features:Unit weight: About 2.2lb/1kg Unit size: 20 x 30in(48 x 74cm)Filler material: 100% polyester fiberPacking: Vacuum packingWashing instructions:1 Gentle cycle machine wash2.Do not bleach,iron and dry-cleanWe provide replacement and refund if you meet any quality issues,Please contact us. productInformation.value: #32,060 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #170 in Bed Pillows

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought these on sale, read the reviews and while some folks hated these, I haven't had that experience. I opened up the pillows andput them in the dryer for half an hour and these things are huge! I broke my patella last month and keep my leg elevated. These pillows are so high and soft they really elevate my knee and keep me comfortable. I have a memory foam/gel pillow to sleep on but these are so great behind my back when I'm sitting up in bed reading - they're really cushy! Just remember if when you take them out of the vacuum packing - just put them in the dryer and the fluff up so nicely!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I wanted!
reviews.reviewText: So I was at a hotel at one point they had the absolute best pillows I asked what type of pillows they were and was told to just check Amazon. Found these and had them in my cart for a little while. I recently got a new mattress so I bought new bedding and decided to buy these pillows. I was so amazed at the tiny package with the pillows inside took them out and they fluffed up nicely. I didn’t review straight away so I could give a fair review. All I can say is I will be ordering more of these because they are so comfy! They don’t hurt my neck but they also support my head. They are so comfy, fluffy and even stay chill/cool. Definitely a great buy for the price and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very large/ long but not very fluffy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Not very fluffy or thick. Two of them were needed to be the thickness of a normal pillow. I will say that they were very long though and stretched across my twin bed which was convenient.Could be comfy but you would need 2-3 since they don't really fluff up. Personally wouldn't probably buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Me and my husband love them. Super comfy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I follow the instructions and threw them in the dryer for a while and they got super fluffy. When you first receive it they are compressed and flat but if you follow the instructions and do use a dryer your fine. Now the pillow it self is super super soft a little to soft for my liking but a good size pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love my new soft white pillows
reviews.reviewText: They're great, I love them, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the worst pillows I have ever tried. After putting in dryer for 15 minutes as instructed, they're still so flat that my head goes right to the bed, using 2. They say 50% hollow foam & 50% gel foam but what they sent me is 100% polyester, false advertising, and cant return because the 4 I bought wont fit in the box as they came vaccum sealed.... Amazon has let the quality of products & sellers to go downhill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these pillows, perfect size and shape, very comfy. I have allergies to some pillows and no problems with these.
